description: This file contains unit tests for content router endpoints in a FastAPI application, specifically testing content listing, creation, and retrieval functionalities.

classes.name: _FakeContentService
classes.description: A mock service class to simulate content-related operations for testing purposes.

methods.name: test_content_list_ok_with_pagination
methods.description: Test that listing content with pagination returns the expected data.

methods.name: test_content_create_returns_201
methods.description: Test that creating new content returns a 201 status and correct data.

methods.name: test_content_get_not_found
methods.description: Test retrieval of content that does not exist results in a 404 error.
